lenders.name: Rodney Howard Browne
lenders.loan_because:
God's Plan by Rodney Howard Browne

It is easy to lose your bearings in the hurricane. You can't find your way through the circumstances you are facing. In Luke's words, "All hope of our being saved" is deserted. At that tough, gut-wrenching moment, God claims, "Don't be alarmed, I am in possession of a plan.". People facing intense difficulty find it difficult to target anything except for the exploding waves and stinging winds. We've heard from the Lord that none will be lost.". We find stability in gales through what God has told.

Your bent will be to turn to another source for strength rather than the Word of the Lord. The only anchor of stability that can hold you firm, irrespective of how intense the gale-force winds, is God's written Word. All this makes me think about a statement made by one of the standard Jewish soothsayers, which supports the loyalty of the Lord God and His Word.

The following words flow from the seasoned hand of Isaiah : "But now, so claims the LORD, your Creator, O Jacob, and He who formed you, O Israel, 'Do not fear, for I have redeemed you ; I have called you by name ; you are Mine. When you pass through the waters, I'll be capable of being with you ; and through the brooks, they will not overflow you'" ( Isaiah 43:1-2 ). "Do not fear, I have called you by name." What a great thought. Isaiah wasn't writing of literal waters or exact brooks. He promises, "I will be with you." he's your anchor.

lenders.occupational_info: I've started an employment initiative within the informal traders in South Africa. I manufacture and produce alternative energy products and we are using grass roots selling and distribution through these hawkers. Creating employment while supplying a clean  and safe alternative energy to families using un-safe & un-healthy fuels - like wood, coal, paraffin, candles...

lenders.name: Rodney Howard
lenders.loan_because:
What God Wants Us to Hear by Rodney Howard Browne

Put simply, stick with the evangelizing plan God has sure to praise and use. Don't try and be so creative and adorable that folks miss the truth. No need for unintelligible and crazy substitutes that entertain but barely convict the lost and edify the saved. Will you notice something here? This exhortation isn't addressed to the hearer, it's for the spokesman.

The person that is to do that's the one exclaiming the message. Be ready to do it in season and out of season. Don't get on up and begin with an apology that you didn't quite have sufficient time to prepare.

That doesn't wash." And do so faithfully when it's convenient and when it's not. Sadly , in a shocking number of churches today, God's people are being told what they have to hear rather than what they have to hear. A watered-down gospel may attract gigantic crowds ( for some considerable time ), but it has no never-ending impact. I can't say I have been capable of finding any place in the Scriptures where God expresses the least bit of doubt for drawing numbers.

Enjoyable the curious itching ears of our postmodern audiences is an exercise in futility.

Frankly , I'm going to resume doing exactly that, by God's grace, until the day He calls me home. And I think there is a fast-increasing number of supporters who long for nutritive messages based on the Word of the Lord Almighty not human standpoint. The world urgently needs more Christians with the fervor and faith of Paul. Will you be one of them? Will you reply the charge? If this is the case there's no better time than now to start.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: In parts of Asia and Africa, women are sold into sex-slavery, are abused by husbands and are kept illiterate as a means to conduct foreign policy in the most oppressed of countries. As women have been abused and discriminated against in the cruelest of ways in  these foreign countries, it is extremely important to lend aid to women in countries whose “war on terror” has become a “war on misogamy.” The general idea is that the more oppressed  a country is, the more poverty, and therefore the worse the treatment of its female citizens. The kind of aid I will be lending will help them create opportunities for themselves so they will be able to break away from the violence associated with this new “war” by helping them start businesses of their own, making them better equipped to be in control of their own success. Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn explore this idea brilliantly in their Pulitzer-prize winning book, “Half the Sky: Turning Oppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide,” by explaining how economic progress will be best brought about by tapping into the potential of the female population. Because as Kristof so truthfully puts it, “Women are not the problem. They are the solution.”
lenders.occupational_info: I have created a Kiva micro-lending program called “Women Entrepreneurs” that I hope to get both the women of Newport Beach, California and girls of Sage Hill School involved in. The idea is that if women are given opportunities to make a good living for themselves, they will become more confident and independent, will better be able to provide for their families, will become more respected in their communities, and will therefore be treated slightly differently in their society at large. I plan to supplement my efforts by simultaneously becoming an advocate for global women’s rights,  and joining and partnering with organizations that I can encourage the Newport Beach activists to become a part of. Throughout this process, I will be continuing my research, and will make an effort as to alert the State Department of my findings towards the end of the academic year.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: It's easy to forget that there are other people beyond your immediate circle of friends and family, and that many of those people are seriously struggling.  Kiva is an amazing way to not only help people, but it encourages a way for those who have it tough to keep working, keep building.  As opposed to simply slapping a band-aid on the problem of poverty, Kiva is a real cure, in that it helps people create their own solutions for stability and success in life.  Three cheers for Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a singer and writer of songs... and also an actor.  I love the arts, love to perform... the world is a stage.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: its sustainable!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help in the efforts to secure freedom and equal rights for all of the women across the globe. 

Women will change the world through their peaceful and compassionate nature and their common sense. They are already doing it. We will continue to undo the damage caused by greedy men, misogynistic religions and rulers, and archaic laws that prevent women from fulfilling their potential in life.

I'm a Goddess worshiper who wants to see the female aspect of God be revered as much as, or even moreso, than the male aspect. We've had quite enough of this man-god business and now it's time to move on to a more enlightened, spiritual existence. I do not want to give money to any organization that promotes archaic religious beliefs (this includes Christianity, Judaism, Islam, and Hinduism.) I also don't wish to give my money to men so they can spend it on cars, beer, pay-per-view games, 900 lines, and prostitutes. I only trust women to do what's right and that's who I wish to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a pagan website, offering information about paganism, witchcraft, and Wicca. I also offer information on feminism, women's rights, domestic and child abuse, sexual violence, Christianity and other male-centric religions (and the damage they have caused to women worldwide), and any other topic that captures my interest. I work from home and my website provides a nice life for me. I would like to see many other women around the world be able to live as I do, without the stress and physical burden of doing ALL of the work (if men are so d*mn strong why is it that they want women to do all the work?) and also taking care of the children. Women are under way too much pressure and they aren't being offered the education that they need to create a better life and more fulfilling relationships for themselves. I have high hopes for the future of womankind and I can't wait to see the progress we will make within my lifetime.

lenders.name: Meezan
lenders.occupational_info: I was teaching at a new institution in a post-conflict zone (with all the associated problems). The reward was students who revel in the freedom to say what they really think. Located in the Kurdish region of Iraq. Inspired by those students, I am currently doing an MEd regarding pedagogy, fiction and trauma.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: My father built his small business on loans from friends and family. Thanks to those loans and my father's hard work I was able to attend and graduate from college. I want to help people build their business so their family can also have a better future.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at a hotel in Napa Valley, California - a place that is best known for its wine and food. My job is in Guest Reception, which means I help guests in almost every process of their stay at our hotel: making reservations, checking in, finding places to eat, checking out, and anything else they might need.
I love helping others, talking, and meeting new people - so this job is perfect for me.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, opening up opportunities, and that microfinance can be more effective than simple charities and foundations.

lenders.name: Dimitar
lenders.loan_because:
Здравейте,
името ми е Димитър Чакъров. Последните няколко месеца бяха време на напомняне на призива от Бог и служението ми в гр.  Стралджа.  Аз вярвам,  че Бог е този Който възстановява позиции и Той кара хората да осъзнаят,  че извън Божията воля няма успех за тях.   
За тези няколко месеца ние виждаме промяната и работата на Святия Дух.  Работата,  която ми предстои тук е наистина много.  Имам много срещи с хора от църквата,  които се нуждаят от покаяние и обръщане отново към Бог.  Също редовно посещавам моите братя и сестри по домовете им,  за да се моля с тях.  Имам отговорност и към региона около Стралджа.  Благодарен съм,  че Бог ми дава благодат за всички ми дейности тук!  Вярвам,  че църквата ни ще се разшири и ще стане място,  от където ще излизат благословени и помазани служители на Бог!  Знам,  че Царят има велик план за този град и съм готов да го изпълним!  Но за осъществяването му се нуждаем от верни сътрудници,  които да ме подкрепят духовно и материално!  Така че ако вие или ваши приятели не сте се включили в това дело, но желаете,  можете да го направите!    


На 05.09.09 стартирахме младежкото служение под надслов „Новото начало”. Имахме добро и благословено време с много скъпи хора. Помазаното хваление на приятели от Ямбол отвори младите сърца и желанието им за „новото начало”. Приятели от София ни послужиха с насърчителни слова за „новото начало” и това беше кулминацията на Божието присъствие, довела младежите пред Бог в молитва за покаяние и обръщение. 

Предстои ни откриване на нова учебна година на библейски курс в църквата към ORA – International, България. Това е радост и благословение за нас.

Ще започне скоро и детското служение към църквата с нов ентусиазъмработа сред децата. В процес на сформиране е и молитвен тим, който подкрепя всички видове служения на църквата. 

Не на пследно място е ни за предстоящия голям ремонт на църквата с цел подръжка на сградата:покрив; изолация; вътрешен дизайн и уют. Видението ни за дейността на църквата не се ограничава до тук, но ще го споделяме с вас по малко в следващите наши бюлетини.
lenders.occupational_info:
През 2002  г.  завърших бакалавърската си степен по богословие, а  през 2007  г. се дипломирах и като магистър.  
През 2003  година със специално слово и призив от Бога започнах служение в  ЕПЦ‐ гр.  Стралджа с пастор Ангел Петков като помощник пастор и младежки ръководител.  Този период от една година и половина в упоменатата църква Бог ме е употребяваше свръхестествено и съживителното действие  на ха даде плодове,  църквата се  умножи,  благовестието се утвърди,  църковното общество е преобладавало предимно с млада аудитория.  През този период беше сформиран випуск на библейски курс към ОRA‐Интернешънъл в църквата.  Освен в локалната църква съвместната ни работа с п-р Петков даде своите плодове и отражение и в самият район като показахме обгрижване,  много активност в подобряване на реда и църковната дисциплина.  
Есента на 2004  година стартирах магистратурата  си по богословие в Шуменският университет  „Епископ  Константин Преславски”.   В средата на 2005  година трябваше да взема решение да напусна служението си,  поради липса на финанси и поради невъзможноста ми да покривам нуждите си относно обучението ми.  Напускайки служението си с ясната представа,  че не съм завършил цялостно видението  за тази църква аз вярвах,  че ще дойде времето в което да бъда върнат.  От напускането на църквата до този момент  работих в гр.  София за да завърша образованието.

lenders.occupational_info: I recently took more flexible job that allows for volunteering.  I volunteer with a microfinance pass-through organization called Women's Empowerment that funds loans in San Diego, Sonora Mexico, Ghana and Honduras.  www.womenempowerment.org

lenders.loan_because: We believe in the inherent worth and dignity of every person.  We respect that we are part of the interdependent web of all existence.  We loan because of these beliefs, and, because it makes us feel really, really good!

Nourished by our community, we grow spiritually and embrace the world.

It's wonderful to have this direct opportunity to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I have owned and operated my sole proprietor business for twenty years now, brokering plants from wholesale nurseries to residential landscape contractors.

lenders.name: Caroline Alexa McBride
lenders.loan_because: My parents and my country blessed me with many opportunities to succeed while my religion inspires me to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Director of Business Development for Serafina Restaurant Group, a private company consisting of 19 popular restaurants (Italian, French, Japanese and Mexican) in New York City, East Hampton, Philadelphia, White Plains, Miami, Brazil, India, Japan and Russia.  The founders, Vittorio Assaf and Fabio Granato, are Italian immigrants who now employ over 800 people to produce high quality cuisine and provide excellent service at their fashionable locations.  Vittorio and Fabio treat their employees like family and they epitomize the “American Dream” as their culinary empire grows.  My job is to facilitate key aspects of domestic and international expansion and franchising, handle public relations, market locations virally and using traditional methods, promote our specialty products, secure corporate accounts and manage all of our charity activities.  I work with a diverse, energetic staff and eat amazing food everyday—my job is a blessing.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance helps smooth income for entrepreneurs in low-income countries, ultimately allowing them to send their children to school, buy necessary food, and pay health expenses.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Giving other people loans is not only self gratifying, but it funds other people’s livelihood. Kiva acts as a savings account for me, allowing me give help to those in need with money that I wouldn’t be using anyways.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I am a student at Arizona State University, studying Philosophy and Justice Studies, and I am trying to also receive certificates in Ethics, Economic Justice, and Symbolic Systems. I plan to attend law school after I take a year off to participate in some year-long internship/fellowship, whether domestic or abroad.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student and a part time debt collector.

lenders.loan_because: The disparity in wealth between nations is an ongoing cause of much of the world's problems.  This is my small effort to move things, however slightly, in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use computers to improve their working and personal lives.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: This is the real free-trade, a direct connection between the haves and the have-nots.  NAFTA, the WTO, the World Bank, the IMF, and all their ilk are simply new ways for the rich to grow richer.  I'd rather help the poor grow richer.
